attributes.action: Ban the Traffic Light Food Labelling System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I like a good number of people in this country am colour blind. Because of my red-green colour blindness I cannot understand these traffic light labels. I think they are unfair and discriminate against colour blind people they should be banned in favour of labels displaying % values instead.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
